name: Legends of Vorayza
description:
Hey, I'm making new game, hope you like it. 


Project is in Early Alpha so i'm open for suggestions about some changes.

I'm going to make story based on your choices so there will be many ways to complete the game.

It's very short but i will be uploading new versions soon.

11-03-2016 Alpha 1.3

Better visual effects using parallax mapping, new map and some test NPC's.
